hints.content:
The bar for chocolate is the tallest.  Chocolate was the most popular flavor.

The bar for strawberry is the shortest.  Strawberry was the least popular flavor.

$\text{Chocolate} - \text{Strawberry} = \text{difference in customers}$

The bar for chocolate lines up with $\purpleD{125}$ on the scale.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\purpleD{125}$ customers picked chocolate as their favorite flavor.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of Customers and the vertical axis labeled Ice Cream Flavor. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125, and 150. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Vanilla, Chocolate, Strawberry, and Cookie dough. The bar line for each type of ice cream flavor shows the following: vanilla bar line extends to 100, chocolate bar line extends to 125, strawberry bar line extends to 25, and cookie dough bar line extends to 75. A purple line labeled 125 is drawn up from 125, which reaches to the end of chocolate bar line labeled 125. !

hints.content:
The bar for strawberry lines up with $\greenC{25}$ on the scale.

[[☃ image 1]]

$\greenC{25}$ customers picked strawberry as their favorite flavor.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of Customers and the vertical axis labeled Ice Cream Flavor. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125, and 150. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Vanilla, Chocolate, Strawberry, and Cookie dough. The bar line for each type of ice cream flavor shows the following: vanilla bar line extends to 100, chocolate bar line extends to 125, strawberry bar line extends to 25, and cookie dough bar line extends to 75. A green line labeled 25 is drawn up from 25, which reaches to the end of strawberry bar line labeled 25. !

hints.content: $\blueD{100}$ more customers picked the most popular flavor than the least popular flavor.

question.content:
Dessert Zone asked its customers about their favorite ice cream flavor and graphed the results.


[[☃ image 1]]

**How many more customers picked the most popular flavor than the least popular flavor?**

[[☃ input-number 1]] customers

options.alt: A bar graph shows the horizontal axis labeled Number of Customers and the vertical axis labeled Ice Cream Flavor. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: 0, 25, 50, 75, 100, 125, and 150. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: Vanilla, Chocolate, Strawberry, and Cookie dough. The bar line for each type of ice cream flavor shows the following: vanilla bar line extends to 100, chocolate bar line extends to 125, strawberry bar line extends to 25, and cookie dough bar line extends to 75. !
